overview: Got MILF? We Do! Former Playmate and adult superstar Teri Weigel returns to the XXX screen to claim her rightful title as the ultimate "American MILF." When Teri walks in on her loser husband banging an 18-year-old neighborhood slut, she sets out on a blistering, no-holds-barred sexual rampage of mega-MILF proportion. No one is safe as Teri savagely seduces the gardener, her son's friends, and even her own best-friend! This cougar is on the prowl!
title: American MILF
